about_the_game:
Unleashed FMX is an indie project developed by TGO Midia with support from KD Studios, and published by TGO Midia. This is an early beta representing the very start of what we plan to build. After 18 months of development, we’ve assembled a single-player FMX (freestyle motocross) experience for PC that we’ll continue expanding and refining over time. The game may undergo significant changes, and we’re committed to ongoing development without a set end point.

About the Game In this early version of Unleashed FMX, you’ll ride through FMX-focused courses, learning new tricks and honing your technique.

The current focus is on ensuring the core bike gameplay is polished and fun. Only after we’ve solidified this foundation will we begin exploring other features like multiplayer modes, racing gameplay, and additional vehicle types such as snowmobiles, mountain bikes, buggies, and cars.

These other vehicles are still far off, and we won’t consider adding them until the core FMX experience is is fully refined.

Key Features (Early Beta)

  • Core FMX Gameplay: Start with fundamental motocross action, built for growth and improvement over time.

  • Future Updates & Expansions: Multiplayer, racing elements, and other vehicle classes are planned, but only after the bike gameplay is perfected.

  • Continuous Development: Expect ongoing changes, updates, and content additions based on community feedback.

  • Player Guidance: Share your thoughts to help shape the direction of the game as it evolves.

content_descriptors.notes: The game portrays impact sports, that is, sports with acrobatic tricks, which can be dangerous for smaller people
